alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Henry (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 9:47AM EST until March 08 at 10:13AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... Maumee River near Defiance affecting Defiance and Henry Counties. Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Williams, Defiance and Fulton OH Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Indiana... Saint Joseph River Ohio near Newville affecting Allen IN, Defiance and De Kalb Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Ohio... Indiana... Saint Marys River near Decatur affecting Van Wert, Allen IN and Adams Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Maumee River near Defiance. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding occurs in Kingsbury and Pontiac Parks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM EST Tuesday was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 5.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
